amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Fish and Wildlife Management by $14.7 million and reduce funding for Forest Products by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Fish and Wildlife Management by $14.7 million and to reduce funding for Forest Products by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wu amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 249 (Roll no. 277).
